casebody.data:
On respondent’s petition for reconsideration filed May 25, motion for relief from default granted; reconsideration allowed; former disposition (196 Or App 637, 106 P3d 646) withdrawn; affirmed August 2, petition for review denied December 5, 2006 (342 Or 117) STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. LUIS AGUILAR-AVILA, Appellant. 00C-53561, 02C-48219; A119821 (Control), A120349

(Cases Consolidated)

140 P3d 1167 Hardy Myers, Attorney General, Mary H. Williams, Solicitor General, and Jonathan H. Fussner, Attomey-InCharge, Criminal Appeals Unit, for petition. Before Edmonds, Presiding Judge, and Wollheim and Schuman, Judges. PER CURIAM

Motion for relief from default granted; reconsideration allowed; former disposition withdrawn; affirmed. State v. Perez, 340 Or 310, 131 P3d 168 (2006); State v. Gornick, 340 Or 160, 130 P3d 780 (2006).
